source_objects.title: Business Strategy
source_objects.description: Become a master strategist with courses on the following: business strategy, performance innovation, marketing strategy, customer loyalty and more.

items.title: Fundamentals of Life Cycle Assessment (LCA)
items.headline: A knowledge graph-based overview of LCA principles and framework for sustainable product design and development
objectives_summary: Gain a high-level understanding of the key steps and concepts in the methodology for LCA
Build a foundation for more expert courses on the subject of LCA
Assimilate how the LCA methodology is brought to life through actual examples

items.headline: Learn about the TOGAF 9.2 Standard and prepare for the certification Level 2 Certified.
objectives_summary: Learn the TOGAF® 9.2 recommended techniques for Enterprise Architecture
Be more prepared and in less time than studying on your own
Understand the advanced concepts of the TOGAF® 9.2 standard

items.title: THE 8 FACTORS: Gain Clarity & Grow Your Business
items.headline: Learn a proven system used to start, manage and grow business, fast. Get MBA knowledge without the expensive price tag.
objectives_summary: Learn how to start, better manage, and grow your business.
The 8 Factors is Effective... It distills the white noise of business books, MBA theory and management rhetoric into a powerfully simple and practical program that delivers proven results.
The 8 Factors is Actionable... It provides entrepreneurs with a simple, repeatable, easy to understand business management methodology that can be put in practice today.

items.title: Digital Transformation and Industry 4.0 Masterclass
items.headline: Build real world understanding of Digital Transformation, Industry 4.0, value drivers and best practices to implement
objectives_summary: Understand what do terms like Digitalization, Industry 4.0, Society 5.0 mean
Build a deep understanding of 7 core Industry 4.0 technologies (AI, IoT, Blockchain, AR/VR, RPA, Cloud, 3D Printing) and their applications in business
Learn the key business drivers of digitalization and a framework for crafting digital strategy

items.title: Strategic Management - Basic
items.headline: Strategic management is nothing but planning for both predictable as well as unfeasible contingencies.
objectives_summary: What is Strategic Management
Explain What is a Strategy
Describe the Strategy Statement and its Components

items.title: Online Reputation Management: Negative Business Reviews
items.headline: Techniques to help you solve negative reviews and earn better reviews; increase sales and gain more happy customers!
objectives_summary: Over 23 lectures and 3 hours of consulting and educational expertise helping businesses improve their Online Reputation Management.
Take proper steps in handling online negative business reviews.
How to take the emotion out of responding to a negative review.

items.title: Lean Manufacturing made Easy - Introduction to Lean
items.headline: Introduction to Lean is the Foundation you need to advance your career or company in Continuous Improvement
objectives_summary: Overview of lean.
Overview of waste.
Lean culture.

items.title: Passive Income : Our Methods To Make Money Online for 2021
items.headline: Start Generating Passive Income & Enjoy Your Life with different online passive income streams
objectives_summary: Identify and choose between the many different types of passive income
Apply real life examples that can generate  real passive income
Planning and achieve financial freedom with Passive Income

items.title: Full Business Analysis Study Guide (CCBA®/CBAP® prep)
items.headline: Sharpen your BA skills for a better career and get prepared for a CBAP® or CCBA® exam!
objectives_summary: Business analysis practice and methodology on the level to pass a certification exam
Key success factors to perform better analysis
Structured view on business analysis core knowledge areas and skills

items.title: Six Sigma Black Belt QFD Specialist Certification

objectives_summary: Master the Ability to Understand Your Customer Requirements
Systematically Translate Requirements to Process Technical Requirements OR Engineering Characteristics required for Your Business Process
Discover the Needs & Requirements of Your Customers and Plan Your Organization's Response to these fulfill these Needs & Requirements

items.title: The Fundamentals of end-to-end Supply Chain Management
items.headline: Supply Chain Management - Level 1: Introducing all the Key Components of a Supply Chain
objectives_summary: An overview of: the end-to-end supply chain, supply chain management, procurement & supplier management, contracts & negotiations, supply chain strategy, logistics (inbound & outbound), supply chain enablement, supply chain planning, supply chain network optimisation.
